name: Abel Tesfaye
bio: With over 15 years of experience in the tech industry, Abel founded Meleket with a vision to transform information access in Ethiopia.

name: Sara Haile
bio: Sara leads our creative team, bringing over a decade of experience in design and branding for both Ethiopian and international clients.

name: Daniel Berhanu
bio: Daniel oversees all technical aspects of Meleket, with a focus on developing scalable solutions for emerging markets.

name: Hana Girma
bio: Hana specializes in digital marketing strategies that connect with Ethiopian consumers and diaspora communities worldwide.

name: Solomon Abebe
bio: Solomon brings technical expertise in mobile and web development, with a passion for creating intuitive user experiences.

name: Tizita Bekele
bio: Tizita combines aesthetics with functionality to design digital products that are both beautiful and user-friendly.
